data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Repuplika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Repuplika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Repuplika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,080 believers in Repuplika Srpska to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Repuplika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Repuplika Srpska access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Repuplika Srpska words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary:
the state of Repuplika Srpska, Bosnia and Herzegovina has a population of 1,327,000.

We estimate Repuplika Srpska has 2,080 people who might know Jesus, 541,567 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 783,353 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 637 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,080 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
